org.tal.redstonechips.circuit
Class BitSetCircuit

java.lang.Object
  org.tal.redstonechips.circuit.Circuit
      org.tal.redstonechips.circuit.BitSetCircuit

public abstract class BitSetCircuit
extends Circuit

A Redstone Circuit that treats its inputs as multiple bit sets. The word length of each set is determined by the number of output bits.

Author:
Tal Eisenberg

Description copied from class: Circuit
Called after the chip is activated by a user or after the chip is loaded from file.

Specified by:
init in class Circuit
Parameters:
sender - The command sender that activated the chip, or null if called on startup.
args - Any words on the sign after the circuit type.
Returns:
true if the init was successful, false if an error occurred.
